description: Try our easy to follow Ham With Ginger Glaze recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ham With Ginger Glaze Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Carefully remove rind from ham, leaving as much fat as possible on the ham.

Using a sharp knife score a diamond pattern into the fat, taking care to not cut all the way through to the meat. Place ham on a rack in a roasting dish and pour 2cm of water into the base of the pan.
Meanwhile, make the ginger glaze. Using a vegetable peeler, peel the rind from the orange trying to leave all the white pith behind. Thinly slice rind into strips. Juice the orange.
Combine orange juice, rind and remaining ingredients in a small saucepan. Stir over low heat until marmalade and sugar have dissolved. Bring to the boil and simmer for 5 minutes.
Brush glaze all over ham and bake for 3040 minutes, brushing with glaze every 10 minutes or until golden and heated through. Serve with sliced buttered sourdough bread and mustard.
